stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Respond to parts a, b, and c.

 

  1. Identify ONE technological development that contributed to the spread of religious ideas in Africa or Asia during the period 1450–1750.

  2. Explain ONE way religious groups or institutions contributed to the spread of religious ideas in Africa or Asia during the period 1450–1750.

  3. Explain ONE way interactions between different ethnic groups contributed to the creation of new religious practices in Africa or Asia during the period 1450–1750.
